text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The day of tryouts is finally here...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Eishin Flash is getting warmed up to<n>run 1,600 meters. Her
condition seems<n>fine, but something has her on edge...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Ah...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Following her eyes, I spot a couple<n>who don't quite blend in
with the<n>crowd. The "I mean business" look on<n>their faces
reminds me of Eishin<n>Flash.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Sigh... Toi, toi, toi.

text_block_list.name: School Staff A
text_block_list.text:
It's time! All runners for the<n>1,600-meter race, please gather<n>
round!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Auf geht's!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her parents watching over her, Eishin<n>Flash starts in the
tryout race.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Ah... Trainer. You came to watch.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ...Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Can't blame her for feeling down.<n>She ended up finishing in
sixth. But<n>still...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
No, my performance was hardly<n>satisfactory. The results
say it all.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
...We really do perceive things<n>differently, don't we?
Actually, I...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I'd... like to ask a favor of you. I'm<n>about to meet up with
my parents.<n>Would you come with me?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Yes. Given my results, I'm not<n>confident I'll be able to keep
calm in<n>front of them. But...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
You told me before that my feelings<n>would get across. So I,
um...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ...Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
When Eishin Flash sees her parents<n>waiting for her, she
stops in her<n>tracks.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She seems hesitant, so I nod as if to<n>urge her forward.
Having found her<n>determination, she takes a step<n>forward.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Father, Mother. It's good to seeyou. Thank you for upholding your endof our promise and coming to watch me race.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: But I couldn't uphold mine. I wantedto show you that your daughter hadgrown up correctly, but I...

text_block_list.name: Flash's Mother
text_block_list.text: Flash, you did well.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: Yes, your results were not perfect,but your effort was evident. Iremember how you used to getoverly tense, but it's apparent you'velearned to control it.

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: You've put in countless hours ofhard work for our sake, didn't you?Just like we taught you. We are proudto call you our daughter.

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: Thank you for this gift, our dearSchatzi.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
(It's coming back to me now. That<n>holiday eve, Father said
to me...)

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: Flash, our dear Schatzi, you mustnever forget this—one reason we donot tolerate error is, of course, toensure quality.

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: But there is another, more importantreason. We do what we do properly,and with care, for the sake of bringing happiness to another.

text_block_list.name: Young Flash
text_block_list.text: To bring... happiness?

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: If not for this, anyone with therecipe could do our job. The meaningof our work comes from the care andlove we put into it.

text_block_list.name: Young Flash
text_block_list.text: But those things don't add anyflavor. Your recipes don't say toinclude them either...

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: Heh... Fair enough. You don't needto understand the difference now. Butyou will one day, when you are capable of work you are proud of.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
(It was never just about winning<n>according to plan.
Everything I put into<n>improving for their sake has led to the<n>
happiness we share now.)

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
(I was so terrified of throwing<n>everything off course, but I
never<n>needed to be. There was something<n>more important
all along.)

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Father, Mother—thank you. I... I triedmy best.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The expression on her face is looking<n>brighter as she
introduces me to her<n>parents afterwards.

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text:
Japanese, okay. I learned with her, so<n>I know a little. Flash,
who is this?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: This is my trainer.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Or rather, the person I'd like to be my<n>trainer. Nothing's final
yet.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her words catch me off guard, but I<n>already know my
answer. My mind<n>was made up the moment I first laid<n>
eyes on her.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
choice_data_list: I am her trainer. Now it's final.

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text:
I see... Please, take good care of my<n>daughter. Flash, work
hard together.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Yes, Father!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
The schedule I made was perfect,<n>and I wasn't wrong to
follow it. But...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I didn't have what it took to carry it<n>out. I was naive and
pushed myself<n>too far.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
It seems I really am clueless... I can<n>draw a line for myself
to follow, but<n>once I step off, I don't know how to<n>get
back on.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
But I now understand how important<n>it is to have someone
with a different<n>perspective who can determine<n>where that
line is going.
choice_data_list:
And that's why you chose me to be your
trainer?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Yes... And why did you agree?
choice_data_list:
I've been interested since the first time I saw
you.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Wait, you have been?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
When I saw the pure determination in<n>her eyes, the beauty
of her running... I<n>thought to myself how I want to take<n>her
as far as she can go, and then<n>farther still.
choice_data_list: I'm sure this was all part of your plan.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
No, this can't have been planned. At<n>least, it was never part
of any of my<n>plans.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
And so, a correction is needed. From<n>this point forward, I
must race to my<n>utmost and improve myself as a<n>runner.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I'll work you into my schedule, and<n>together, we'll
accomplish this goal<n>and do work we can be proud of.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so begins our steady—and<n>well-planned—path to the
Twinkle<n>Series.
